title: Scrape data from sub-reddit and store data in the database
author: Surya P V
description:
The code will scrape the data from reddit and store the user reviews to backend database. Sub-reddit handle name needs to be passed as user parameter. The following passwords needs to be included in the config file:
REDDIT_CLIENT_ID, REDDIT_CLIENT_SECRET, REDDIT_USER_AGENT
DB_HOST, DB_NAME, DB_USER, DB_PASS, DB_PORT
